mapper.select: SELECT t.tid, t.task_content AS TaskContent, t.task_time AS taskTime, t.status, t.create_time AS createTime, t.type FROM task_info t WHERE t.task_time = #{time} and status = 0 order by desc

SELECT t.tid, t.contact_id, t.number, t.task_content, t.type, t.task_time, t.status, t.create_time, t.time_index FROM task_info t WHERE t.contact_id = #{contactId} AND t.type = #{type} ORDER BY task_time DESC LIMIT 0, 1
